channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 17:18 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 17:18 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:09 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
